text: Tabintin wonkii maaɗa kin wonndude e ɓen noddooɓe Joomi maɓɓe ka bimmbi e ka kiikiiɗe hiɓe faandii Jaati Makko Kin, wata gite maa ɗe yawtu gaayi maɓɓe hara hiɗa faandii cuɗaari ngurdan aduna, wota a ɗofto on mo Men welsindini ɓernde mun gaayi jantagol Men o jokki beleeɗe makko fiyaake makko on woni halkaare
